definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide

to string together/to skewer/to connect wrongly/to gang up/to rove/string/bunch/skewer/classifier for things that are strung together, or in a bunch, or in a row: string of, bunch of, series of/to make a swift or abrupt linear movement (like a bead on an abacus)/to move across

sentences.english: This is a sentence or string phrase that has been encrypted.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個被加密的句子或字符串短語。

sentences.english: It's used for objects such as string constants and classes.
sentences.chinese: 它用於諸如字符串常量和類之類的對象。

sentences.english: Select the address string and copy it to the clipboard.
sentences.chinese: 選擇地址字符串並將其複製到剪貼板。

sentences.english: So these format strings we saw earlier.
sentences.chinese: 比如之前看到的格式化字符串。

sentences.english: Every post will have a random string as the unique key.
sentences.chinese: 每一個帖子將使用一個隨機字符串作爲惟一鍵。

sentences.english: It retrieves the version attribute in string form.
sentences.chinese: 它獲取了字符串格式的版本屬性。

sentences.english: Then we need to push those values as strings into the image.
sentences.chinese: 然後需要把這些值作爲字符串傳遞到圖像中。

sentences.english: Replace sequences of white-space within the string with a single space.
sentences.chinese: 在字符串內使用單空格替換連續的空白。

sentences.english: Use string functions with length checks more often.
sentences.chinese: 使用字符串函數長度檢查較爲頻密。

sentences.english: It will invoke the service and print out the echoed string on the console.
sentences.chinese: 它將調用服務並在控制檯上打印出回顯字符串。

sentences.english: Are strings being repeatedly concatenated without string buffers?
sentences.chinese: 字符串被反覆連接並沒有使用字符串緩衝？

sentences.english: The service takes a string and returns the audio file as an attachment.
sentences.chinese: 這個服務接收字符串並將音頻文件作爲一個附件返回。

sentences.english: " text string to the active document at the current cursor location.
sentences.chinese: 文本字符串傳遞到活動文檔中光標當前所在的位置。

sentences.english: Returns an array of stings describing the connected joysticks.
sentences.chinese: 返回一個用來描述已連接的控制桿的字符串集合。

sentences.english: This method opens the class and executes the following string on the open class.
sentences.chinese: 這個方法打開類並在打開的類上執行下列字符串。
